text: EA-2054 is an extremely toxic organophosphate nerve agent. It is an extremely potent acetylcholinesterase inhibitor that is resistant to atropine and oxime treatment. ==See also== *Nerve agent *EA-2012 *EA-2098 *EA-2613 ==References== Category:Organophosphate nerve agents Category:Acetylcholinesterase inhibitors Category:Quaternary ammonium compounds Category:Phenol ethers Category:Phenol esters Category:Phosphonate esters Category:Isopropyl esters Category:Tetraphenylborates
title: EA-2054
